typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Military
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system for defence domain.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.military.MilitaryPlatform
typeDescription.description: A reference to a military platform - space, air, land, surface and sub-surface platforms, where the type platform is described as a property.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.military.Weapon
typeDescription.description: A weapon; for example a rifle, knife, or shotgun
